column4: My Ubuntu 8.10 doesn't update by alone, only when I check for updates manualy and by command in Terminal. Why is that?
Ubuntu doesnt update on its own. You have to run sudo apt-get upgrade or do it via the Update Manager as far as i know
it was checking for updates by alone. Now it doesn't check anymore.

Go to System> Administration > Update Manager. Click on Settings in the lower Left Corner. Then in the window that opens , Select Check for Updates. And set it to Daily. There are some other options as well there ;)
